sentences.english: Seeing their son back, the boy's parents showed their gratitude.

sentences.english: Tigers are the animals of the world, and they should have their own living spaces.
sentences.chinese: 老虎是世界性妁动物，它们应该有自己的生存空间。

sentences.english: Tigers are the animals of the world, and they should have their own living spaces. We must do our best to protect the tigers and their living environment.
sentences.chinese: 老虎是世界性妁动物，它们应该有自己的生存空间。
